subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
lead_paragraph: The Giants detailed the prices for personal seat licenses in their new stadium — a menu of one-time fees for fans that start at $1,000 apiece and escalate to $20,000 each for lower-level seats.
snippet: The Giants detailed the prices for personal seat licenses in their new stadium — a menu of one-time fees for fans that start at $1,000 apiece and escalate to $20,000 each for lower-level seats.
